casebody.data:
JANEWAY TOWING, Petitioner
v.
CREDIT CONNECTION AUTO SALES, Respondent No. 692 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. March 22, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 22nd day of March, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.

The Petition to Supplement the Record is DENIED.
